translations: n.栓皮，软木（南欧和北非的一种橡树的树皮）；瓶塞，软木塞；软木浮子
v.用瓶塞塞住；用软木炭涂

sentences.sentence: He drew the cork out of the bottle.
He was pulling the cork from a bottle of wine.
sentences.translation: 他在拔一瓶葡萄酒的瓶塞。

sentences.sentence: I like the pop you get when you pull out a cork.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢你拔出瓶塞时弄出的那“砰”的一声。
